content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Wednesday May 28th, 2025 

Today is a “B” Day   

  • Best Buddies will hold the last meeting today 2:20-3:00 pm in the LGI.  

 

  • There will be a student council meeting today in Mrs. Kerls room. 

 

  • Attention all 8th graders! Are you interested in representing your class next year in high school? If so, be sure to pick up a student council packet from your Social Studies teachers and submit it to Mrs. Kerls by Thursday, May 29. The high school advisor is looking for five motivated and responsible students to join the student council. Don’t miss this chance to make a difference and be a leader in your school community! 

 

  • The International Club is meeting today after school in Room 255. 

 

  • No Place for Hate is canceled today.  

 

Today’s lunch is pizza crunchers, tomato/cucumber/mozzarella salad and strawberry mango ice. 

 

Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND.  

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
